revised_title: Influence of Various Substances on the Development of Protoplasmic and Fungus-Life: A Complementary Study to the Effects on Albumen Solutions
tldr: Dr. F. Crace-Calvert investigates the effects of various substances on the development of protoplasmic and fungus-life in albumen solutions. The study reveals that different compounds have varying degrees of influence on the growth and presence of microscopic life, with some completely inhibiting growth and others promoting it.
